title: When you don't want Kalista to bind you

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

replies.body: Pretty much. And they do it when you are left behind and the 5 man invade is catching up.

> [{quoted}](name=VeigarIsTall,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LqmN0akr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-03T18:31:05.269+0000)
>
> Pretty much. And they do it when you are left behind and the 5 man invade is catching up.

or they try to troll the jg, and bind to them right as the camp is about to die, and last hit it while the jg is in the animation.

Or (true story here) when you're mid as Viktor and the Kalista binds to you while you're laning, leaving you completely vulnerable to the Ahri you're laning against who takes half your health away while you're in the animation. Genius.

Remember kids, when someone offers you a black spear of vengeance:
1. just say no
2. walk away
3. tell an adult immediately
